Name: sot-sheikheliaskeke
Author: Sheikh Elias Keketso Lelia
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa (IDM)

Translations.Text: Eaba Motlotlehi o re: “Ntlisetseng eena koano mona.” Empa ea romileng hoba a fihle ho eena, eaba Josefa o re: “Boela ho Mong`a hau, u ‘motse ka taba ea basali bane ba ho its’eha matsoho. Bona! Ruri Mong`a ka o tseba leraba la bona

Eaba Motlotlehi o bitsa basali bao, a re: “Ho ne ho etsahetse joang ha le tla be le hohelle Josefa ketsong ea sebe? Ba araba ka hore: “Allah a ke a ‘moloke! Rona ha ho sebe seo re se tsebang malebana le eena. Eaba mosali oa letona le leholo o re: “Hajoale ‘nete e pepeneneng. Nkile ka mo kopa ketso ea sebe, Ruri u har’a ba nang le ‘nete.”
Josefa a re: “Ke kopile sena, e le hore Mong`a ka a tle a tsebe hore ha ke’a ka ka mo seolla sephiring, etsoe Ruri Allah ha a tataise leraba la maoatla
Na ha ke itlhotlholle molato. Moea oa botho o sekametse sebeng, kantle le ho oo Mong`a ka A ka ts’ollelang Mohau oa Hae ho oona. Hobane Ruri Mong`a ka U ts’oarela-joalo- joalo, U Khaphatseha Mohau.”

Eaba Motlotlehi o re: “Ntlisetseng eena e le hore ke tle ke mo tlamahanye le bo-’na.” Eitse hoba a buoe le eena, eaba o re: “Kajeno u be le tiisetso ea hore u tla phela ho boteng ba rona bo tsepamisitsoeng le ka bots’epehi.”
Josefa a re: “Mpheng bolaoli holim’a matlo a bokellang lijo tsa naha ena. Ke tla a lebela ka bokhabane le ka tsebo e pharaletseng.”

Ke kamoo Re ileng Ra neha Josefa matla kahar’a naha. O bile le matla holim’a eona le moo a ratang teng. Re apesa ka mohau oa Rona le ka boikhethelo ope eo Re mo ratang. Re ke ke Ra tlohela moputso oa ba etsang botle ho lahleha
Moputso oa bophelo Bo-tlang ona o molemo ka ho fetisisa, ho ba kholoang ba bile ba sesefa bobe
